outputs.output_descr: Conversion from HCFC-22 to Ammonia/CO2 Technology in the Manufacture of Two–stage Refrigeration Systems for Cold Storage and Freezing Applications  at Yantai Moon Group Co.Ltd

project_descr: Demonstration project for conversion from HCFC-22 technology to Ammonia/CO2 technology in the manufacture of two-stage refrigeration systems for cold storage and freezing applications at Yantai Moon Group Co. Ltd.
project_title: Demonstration Project of ICR Sector-Yan Tai Moon
